Requirement Description: The Name Server is supplied with a Domain Name and shall return either the Resource Location, or the Address of another Name Server.
Satisfied by: S.Data, S.Cache, S.Cache.Old, S.Lookup, S.Lookup.Fail, S.Input, S.Robustness

Requirement Description: The Name Server must return data in a timely manner.
The Name Server must not use any stale data.
The Name Server must be capable of being supplied with the Address of a resource and then returning the Domain Name, or the Address of another Domain Server
The Name Server must be capable of having its contents refreshed.
Any refresh information supplied to the Name Server, should be in format that is a subset of the djbdns format.
The Name Server should remain available whilst the contents of the server are being refreshed from the Server.
